description: This file contains utility functions and a class for managing environment variables in a Flutter application. It handles loading environment variables from a .env file, accessing individual variables, and computing the backend base URL with environment-aware defaults.

classes.name: Env
classes.description: A static utility class providing environment variable loading, access, and URL computation tailored for Flutter apps across web and mobile platforms.

methods.name: ensureLoaded
methods.description: Loads the .env file asynchronously once, with an option to set it as optional; subsequent calls are no-ops.

methods.name: getVar
methods.description: Retrieves a variable from the loaded environment variables, ensuring the environment is loaded first.

methods.name: backendBaseUrl
methods.description: Computes the backend base URL based on environment variables or defaults suitable for web and mobile.

methods.name: _sanitizeBaseUrl
methods.description: Removes trailing slashes from a URL for consistency.
